Awnsers: JCP stands for JIO COGNITIVCE PLATFORM

Questions: How do I make a new account
Awnsers: You can create a new account by signing on the jcp.jioconnect.in website

Questions: is the address of the location I pin captured automatically
Awnsers: Yes, after you drag the pin to your location your address is captured automatically

Questions: how do I turn on dark light mode
Awnsers: On the top right corner you can toggle the switch for dark mode
